channel.title: Lessons Learned on /home/danny
channel.description: Recent content in Lessons Learned on /home/danny

item.title: Sweat the Small Things
item.description:
Today, I had an issue with my Hugo and PaperMod powered blog. Hugo and PaperMod are the only 2 dependencies in my blog and I figured I’d pull them up. I started with pulling up PaperMod, but had issues with minimum version. I thought I was on a new enough version of Hugo (0.138 from my recollection) on Windows, but the pushed site still did not render properly on Vercel.

I switched over to my Mac, ran nix flake update and my site built and rendered properly on Vercel again. OK! Now I’m up and running again!
